chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (l : list) (m : fmap), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> pre_ring0 m l -> double_link_list m l -> planar (Br m l)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
double_link_list = fix double_link_list (m : fmap) (l : list) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | lam => True | cons x x' l0 => double_link m x x' /\ double_link_list m l0 end : fmap -> list -> Prop
Br = fix Br (m : fmap) (l : list) {struct l} : fmap := match l with | lam => m | cons x x' l0 => Br (Br1 m x x') l0 end : fmap -> list -> fmap
Inductive list : Set := lam : list | cons : dart -> dart -> list -> list
pre_ring0 = fix pre_ring0 (m : fmap) (l : list) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | lam => True | cons x _ l0 => pre_ring0 m l0 /\ distinct_edge_list m x l0 end : fmap -> list -> Prop
planar = fun m : fmap => genus m = 0 : fmap -> Prop
double_link_list_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (l : list), inv_hmap m -> double_link_list m l -> pre_ring0 m l -> let (x, x') := first l in double_link_list (Br1 m x x') (tail l)
inv_hmap_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (Br m l)
pre_ring0_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (l : list), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> pre_ring0 m l -> let (x, x') := first l in pre_ring0 (Br1 m x x') (tail l)
double_link_list_Br1_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) (l : list), inv_hmap m -> double_link_list m (cons x x' l) -> pre_ring0 m (cons x x' l) -> double_link_list (Br1 m x x') l
pre_ring0_Br1_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) (l : list), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> pre_ring0 m (cons x x' l) -> pre_ring0 (Br1 m x x') l
ring = fun (m : fmap) (l : list) => ~ emptyl l /\ double_link_list m l /\ pre_ring0 m l /\ pre_ring1 m l /\ pre_ring2 m l /\ pre_ring3 m l : fmap -> list -> Prop
Jordan1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> let l := cons x x' lam in ring m l -> nc (Br m l) = nc m + 1
distinct_edge_list_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' xs xs' : dart) (l : list), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> pre_ring0 m (cons x x' (cons xs xs' l)) -> distinct_edge_list (Br1 m x x') xs l
cA1_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br m l) one z = cA m one z
cA1_1_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 (Br m l) one z = cA_1 m one z
ring1_ring3_connect : forall (m : fmap) (x x' xs xs' : dart) (l : list), let l1 := cons x x' (cons xs xs' l) in let y := cA m zero x in let y' := cA m zero x' in inv_hmap m -> planar m -> double_link_list m l1 -> pre_ring1 m l1 -> pre_ring3 m l1 -> ~ expf m y y'
planar_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (B m zero x)
planar_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> x <> x' -> planar (Br1 m x x')
exd_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (Br m l) z
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
not_eqc_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m one x y)
not_eqc_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m zero x y)
plf_planar : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> plf m -> planar m
inversion_planarity : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> planar (L m k x y) -> planar m
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
planar_L_B_top_bot_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x))
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
Euler_Poincare : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> planar m -> ec m / 2 = nc m
planar_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m < -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x))
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_crit_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y))
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
disconnect_planar_criterion_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in expf m y x0 < -> ~ eqc (B m zero x) x y
distinct_edge_list = fix distinct_edge_list (m : fmap) (x : dart) (l : list) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | lam => True | cons xs _ l0 => distinct_edge_list m x l0 /\ ~ expe m x xs end : fmap -> dart -> list -> Prop
pre_ring3 = fix pre_ring3 (m : fmap) (l : list) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | lam => True | cons x x' l0 => pre_ring3 m l0 /\ distinct_face_list m x x' l0 end : fmap -> list -> Prop
disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> double_link m x x' -> let y := cA m zero x in let y' := cA m zero x' in expf m y y' < -> ~ eqc (Br1 m x x') x' y'
disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> double_link m x x' -> let y := cA m zero x in let y' := cA m zero x' in expf m y y' < -> ~ eqc (Br1 m x x') x y

``` 
intros l m H1 H2 H3 H4. 
apply inv_hmap_Br in H1.
apply H2.
apply H4.
apply H3.
```
